catalog_info.title: Case Studies and Research Proposal Preparation
catalog_info.notes: Anthropology 2070a is commonly taken before Anthropology 2070b, but is not a prerequisite. Required of students in the Archaeology Program of Anthropology; open to other graduate students and advanced undergraduates with permission of instructor. Required of students in the Archaeology Program of Anthropology; open to other graduate students and advanced undergraduates with permission of instructor.
catalog_info.description: Seminar for graduate students that will focus on grant and paper writing, and will also include selected case studies.
